name: Akureyrarkirkja
description: This prominent church, designed by state architect Guðjón Samúelsson, was consecrated in 1940 and towers over the town center. Its notable features include a large pipe organ with 3,200 pipes and an opaque central window from England's Coventry Cathedral. A model ship is suspended from the ceiling, reflecting an old tradition for the welfare of loved ones at sea.

opening_hours.winter: Varies (often closed to general visitors outside of services)
